title: Pitta Balancing Ayurveda Essential Oil Blend
cleaned_text: Description Pitta dosha is composed of the elements fire and water. Imbalanced Pitta can cause irritability, ulcers, excess body heat, skin eruptions, and premature baldness/graying. Pitta people benefit from oils, foods and activities that are cooling and soothing, sweet and astringent. When in balance they are naturally contented with strong digestion and a sharp, discriminating intellect. Essential oils of Amyris, Lemon Myrtle, Lime, Ylang-Ylang, Spearmint, and Roman Chamomile. External use only. Do not apply directly to skin without diluting. Disclaimer Additional Details -
